query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS files (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL,
  filename VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  original_name VARCHAR(255),
  file_path VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  file_size BIGINT DEFAULT 0,
  mime_type VARCHAR(100),
  uploader_id VARCHAR(100),
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  deleted_at DATETIME DEFAULT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HmF555sZ6wXsVo.885fbf394348 --database cSZcQBnZuHpLU79S85jppV --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS files (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL,
  filename VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  original_name VARCHAR(255),
  file_path VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  file_size BIGINT DEFAULT 0,
  mime_type VARCHAR(100),
  uploader_id VARCHAR(100),
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  deleted_at DATETIME DEFAULT NULL
);
